original: BOHMAN, Edvard, Grosshandlare, Norrköping, f Nrkp 15/3 72. Eft slut skolgång anst Holmens Br AB 85—13. Eg fma Edvard Bohman, papper i parti, Nrkp, sed. 00, repres fi för-säkr.bol o ch Försäkr AB Fylgias avd.kont Norrkp. Fd led hyresnmd o stadsrev. Fd ordf Nrkp Kont.frn, v. ordf Nrkp Skyttegille o Filatelistfrn. Frimurare, Odd Fellow, W6, Sällsk A. R. Nrkp Skyttegilles, Ögl Skyttefrb o Försäkr AB Fylgias GM, tre skytteGM.
translated:
BOHMAN, Edvard, Wholesale merchant, Norrköping, b. Norrköping 15/3 1872. After completing school, employed at Holmens Br AB 1885-1913. Own business as a wholesaler, Edvard Bohman, paper in bulk, Norrköping, since 1900. Representative for insurance company and the insurance division of Försäkr AB Fylgia, Norrköping branch. Former board member of the rent committee and city revenue. Former chairman of Nrkp Kontinentala Frånland, vice chairman of Nrkp Skyttegille and Filatelistfrn. Freemason, Odd Fellow, member of W6, Sällskap A. R. Nrkp Skyttegilles, Ögl Skyttefrb and Försäkr AB Fylgias Grand Master, three shooting Grand Masters. 

Note: "fma" stands for "firma", which means "business" or "company". The abbreviation "GM" stands for "Grand Master". The note mentioned about '\d\d m. partners name' is not included in the given Swedish text.
